name: SpellChecker.net
overview:
Since 1999 SpellChecker.net, Inc. offers hosted and licensed spell checking technology and services, the company provides spell-checking products for web-applications.

The products address the need for spell check solutions for a number of applications, such as Customer and Relationship Management (CRM), Content Management Systems (CMS), Email Marketing Tools, Help Desk Systems and many others. SpellChecker.net products can be easily integrated and utilized within websites, corporate intranets, web mail, etc. Plug-ins are available for CKEditor, TinyMCE and other HTML editors.

SpellChecker.net, Inc. main products are SpellCheckAsYouType (SCAYT) and WebSpellChecker (WSC).

SpellCheckAsYouType SCAYT allows the user to see and correct misspellings while typing. Misspelled words are underlined. The user just needs to right-click a marked word and select a suggestion to replace the word with.

WebSpellChecker operates in a separate browser window so the work is not obstructed. Corrected text is automatically returned to the form. Includes English language Grammar Checker and Thesaurus.

SpellChecker.net application is widely used by different companies from small businesses to Fortune 1000 companies.
